sect1.title: Clone Repository
sect1.para:
This section talk about how to clone a git repository from other repository. Clone git repository is very simple.At none git repository directory, just use the explorer context menu and select
Git Clone...
.
Url:Input repository URL address, which you will clone from. You can click Browse to browse diectory.
Directory:Input your local directory, which you will clone to. You can click Browse to browse diectory.
If you checkLoad Putty Key the box, clone will auto load putty key file with Pageant. You can click ... to browse putty key file.
Clone will checkout currrent HEAD to work space automatically.
Git clone support http, git and ssh protocol. Show how to choose SSH client. OpenSSH, PLink or TortoisePlink.
